title: Forget the Favorites: Here are 5 Outsiders for the Tour of Flanders
content:
From a former Flanders champion to a raw and raucous rookie, these are the riders that could derail MVDP at De Ronde.

Read the full article at Forget the Favorites: Here are 5 Outsiders for the Tour of Flanders on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
